__e: I was having dinner with a friend... the Bishop of Exmouth.
A small gift to ease the king's conscience is hardly a sign that the bishop of York will be restored to his former glory.
"--from within your walls to squeeze life from the Bishop."
The Bishop is on his way here.
A Bishop's there every time a party sees the ghost.
Word has reached the Bishop of a village that does not suffer as the rest do.
My bishop doesn't know, but he's given me exactly what I wanted:
As long as you have a Bishop, you see the ghost?
